stimulusHtml: The image of the question mark on the program cover best highlights which of the following characteristics of African American Studies?

features.html:
• From top to bottom and left to right are the following words and figures:
    • Black Studies National Conference: Southeastern, U.S.A.
    • Black Studies: Paradox With a Promise
    • A large question mark with the following words inside it:
      • Who
      • Where
      • When
      • How
    • University of North Carolina at Charlotte
    • Charlotte, N.C.
    • March 18-21, 1975

Collection of the Smithsonian National Museum of African American History and Culture, Gift of Dr. Bertha Maxwell Roddey

choicesHtml: The focus on the African diaspora
The inclusion of art and literature
The uncertain origin of the discipline
